description: Enumeration of the fields of a user's download list that can be used for sorting.
name: SortField

enum.name: fileName
enum.description: The name of the file entity.

enum.name: projectName
enum.description: The name of the file's project.

enum.name: addedOn
enum.description: The date-time that the file was added to the user's download list

enum.name: createdBy
enum.description: The ID of the user that created the file.

enum.name: createdOn
enum.description: The date-time when the file was created.
